elements.name: async_activities
elements.title: As part of this workshop you engaged in asynchronous work (activities that weren't part of a video conference call). To what extent do you agree or disagree that the following asynchronous activities were useful for your personal learning and development?

rows.text: Exploration of course materials and resources.
Reflection on your own teaching practice.

elements.name: logistics_virtual
elements.title: To what extent were the following true about participating in this virtual workshop?

rows.text: I received clear communication about how to virtually attend the workshop.
The virtual meeting tool(s) met my learning needs.
My internet connection and technology were adequate to fully participate.

elements.name: virtual_feedback
elements.title: Do you have feedback about the virtual meeting tool or about how logistics were run for this workshop? Please be specific and provide suggestions for improvement.
